title: The Curious Column
description: The Curious Column is a student-led legal literacy newspaper that simplifies legal concepts for children. Through engaging content and real-world examples, we help young readers understand their rights and the law in a fun, age-appropriate way. Our goal is to make legal education accessible and relevant in today's changing world.

title: STEM by Step
description: A free STEM education platform providing hands-on learning experiences and project-based curriculum for underserved communities.
niche: Free STEM Education for Underserved Communities

title: Mic to Millions
description: Beth is a media expert and creator of the Mic to Millions system. We help entrepreneurs, authors, coaches, and experts who are tired of chasing visibility finally get recognized, remembered, and hired, so their name opens doors before they even walk.
niche: business education, business programs and workshops, professional development

title: Rosine Initiative
description: Rosine is a youth-driven initiative empowering young leaders through education, global opportunity, and community projects. Focused on resilience and collaboration, Rosine connects students to international programs and helps them build confidence.
niche: Empowering women through education, global opportunities, leadership development, and community impact.
